at 20 years of age where supplements were given to preterm infants just after birth [139]. Vitamin D deficiency 
is also associated with pre-eclampsia, preterm birth, and small-for-gestational-age babies [138,140,141]. 
It is unlikely that just one deficiency exists in isolation. A range of multiple micronutrient deficiencies may 
coexist in the obese
